text: Patrick Connolly Bergin (4 February 1951) is an Irish actor and singer perhaps best known for his leading role opposite Julia Roberts in Sleeping with the Enemy (1991), the title character in Robin Hood, terrorist Kevin O'Donnell in Patriot Games and for playing the villainous Aidan Maguire in the BBC soap EastEnders in 2017â€“2018. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Actors from Dublin (city) Category:People from Cloughjordan Category:Teachers of English
title: Patrick Bergin
